original_title: Billy's BootCamp Elite: Mission Two - Maximum Power
overview: This innovative program combines the tried and true Tae Bo and BootCamp techniques adn now goes one step farther. These amazing new workouts are fun, fast and effective! In his brand new workout series, Billy will help you break through weight-loss plateaus and boost your metabolism for amazing results! BootCamp Elite is the hottest fitness phenomenon and it's the most complete workout system yet - so you never get bored. Burn fat and calories, get fir, feel motivated, and increase your confidence faster than you ever though possible with BootCamp Elite! In Mission One - Getting Started Billy teaches you the basics behind the BootCamp Workout.
title: Billy's BootCamp Elite: Mission Two - Maximum Power
